00046 /* Private types -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00047 typedef struct
00048 {
00049   u32 OverflowCounter;
00050   u32 StartValue;
00051   u32 CapturePulse;
00052   TM_CHP_Enum ChannelPolarity;
00053   bool DataValid;
00054   bool DataOverwrite;
00055 } sPulseCaptureStructure;
00056 
00057 /* Private function prototypes -----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00058 void Capture_Configuration(void);
00059 void Capture_MainRoutine(void);
00060 void Capture_IRQHandler(void);
00061 void Capture_Process(sPulseCaptureStructure* cap, u16 capture_value, bool isCapBeforeUpdate);
00062 
00063 void PWM_OUT_Configuration(void);
00064 
00065 /* Private variables ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00066 sPulseCaptureStructure CaptureCHx;
00067 
00068 /* Global functions ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00069 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00070   * @brief  Main program.
00071   * @retval None
00072   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00073 int main(void)
00074 {
00075   RETARGET_Configuration();
00076 
00077   Capture_Configuration();
00078 
00079   PWM_OUT_Configuration();
00080 
00081   while (1)
00082   {
00083     Capture_MainRoutine();
00084   }
00085 }
00086 
00087 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00088   * @brief  Capture Main Routine.
00089   * @retval None
00090   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00091 void Capture_MainRoutine(void)
00092 {
00093   if (CaptureCHx.DataValid)
00094   {
00095     printf("Capture: %d %8.2f uS\r\n", CaptureCHx.CapturePulse, ((float)CaptureCHx.CapturePulse / (SystemCoreClock / 1000000ul)));
00096     CaptureCHx.DataValid = FALSE;
00097   }
00098 }
00099 
00100 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00101   * @brief  Configures TM to capture waveform.
00102   * @retval None
00103   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00104 void Capture_Configuration(void)
00105 {
00106   { /* Enable peripheral clock                                                                              */
00107     CKCU_PeripClockConfig_TypeDef CKCUClock = {{ 0 }};
00108     CKCUClock.Bit.AFIO = 1;
00109     CKCUClock.Bit.HTCFG_CAP_IPN = 1;
00110     CKCU_PeripClockConfig(CKCUClock, ENABLE);
00111   }
00112 
00113   /* Configure AFIO mode as TM function                                                                     */
00114   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_CAP_GPIO_ID, HTCFG_CAP_AFIO_PIN, HTCFG_CAP_AFIO_FUN);
00115 
00116   { /* Time base configuration                                                                              */
00117 
00118     /* !!! NOTICE !!!
00119        Notice that the local variable (structure) did not have an initial value.
00120        Please confirm that there are no missing members in the parameter settings below in this function.
00121     */
00122     TM_TimeBaseInitTypeDef TimeBaseInit;
00123 
00124     TimeBaseInit.Prescaler = 1 - 1;                         // Timer clock = CK_AHB / 1
00125     TimeBaseInit.CounterReload = 0xFFFF;
00126     TimeBaseInit.RepetitionCounter = 0;
00127     TimeBaseInit.CounterMode = TM_CNT_MODE_UP;
00128     TimeBaseInit.PSCReloadTime = TM_PSC_RLD_IMMEDIATE;
00129     TM_TimeBaseInit(HTCFG_CAP_PORT, &TimeBaseInit);
00130 
00131     /* Clear Update Event Interrupt flag since the "TM_TimeBaseInit()" writes the UEV1G bit                 */
00132     TM_ClearFlag(HTCFG_CAP_PORT, TM_FLAG_UEV);
00133   }
00134 
00135   { /* Channel n capture configuration                                                                      */
00136 
00137     /* !!! NOTICE !!!
00138        Notice that the local variable (structure) did not have an initial value.
00139        Please confirm that there are no missing members in the parameter settings below in this function.
00140     */
00141     TM_CaptureInitTypeDef CapInit;
00142 
00143     TM_CaptureStructInit(&CapInit);
00144     CapInit.Channel = HTCFG_CAP_CH;
00145     CapInit.Polarity = TM_CHP_NONINVERTED;
00146     CapInit.Selection = TM_CHCCS_DIRECT;
00147     CapInit.Prescaler = TM_CHPSC_OFF;
00148     #if (LIBCFG_TM_652XX_V1)
00149     CapInit.Fsampling = TM_CHFDIV_1;
00150     CapInit.Event = TM_CHFEV_OFF;
00151     #else
00152     CapInit.Filter = 0x0;
00153     #endif
00154     TM_CaptureInit(HTCFG_CAP_PORT, &CapInit);
00155   }
00156 
00157   /* Enable TM Channel Capture and Update Event interrupts                                                  */
00158   TM_IntConfig(HTCFG_CAP_PORT, HTCFG_CAP_CCR | TM_INT_UEV, ENABLE);
00159   NVIC_EnableIRQ(HTCFG_CAP_IRQn);
00160 
00161   TM_Cmd(HTCFG_CAP_PORT, ENABLE);
00162 }
00163 
00164 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00165   * @brief  This function handles GPTM interrupt.
00166   * @retval None
00167   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00168 void HTCFG_CAP_IRQHandler(void)
00169 {
00170   bool update_flag = FALSE;
00171 
00172   /* store and clear all interrupt flags                                                                    */
00173   u32 status = HTCFG_CAP_PORT->INTSR;
00174   u32 cnt = HTCFG_CAP_PORT->CNTR;
00175   #if 0
00176   if ((status & TM_INT_UEV) != (HTCFG_CAP_PORT->INTSR & TM_INT_UEV))
00177   {
00178     status = HTCFG_CAP_PORT->INTSR;
00179     cnt = HTCFG_CAP_PORT->CNTR;
00180   }
00181   #endif
00182   HTCFG_CAP_PORT->INTSR = ~status;
00183 
00184   if (status & TM_INT_UEV)
00185   {
00186     update_flag = TRUE;
00187     /* The OverflowCounter will stop at max value 0xFFFF                                                    */
00188     if (CaptureCHx.OverflowCounter != 0xFFFF)
00189       CaptureCHx.OverflowCounter++;
00190   }
00191 
00192   if (status & HTCFG_CAP_CCR)
00193   {
00194     u32 cap_value = TM_GetCaptureCompare(HTCFG_CAP_PORT, HTCFG_CAP_CH);
00195     bool isCapBeforeUpdate = (update_flag && (cap_value > cnt))? TRUE : FALSE;
00196     Capture_Process(&CaptureCHx, cap_value, isCapBeforeUpdate);
00197     TM_ChPolarityConfig(HTCFG_CAP_PORT, HTCFG_CAP_CH, CaptureCHx.ChannelPolarity);
00198   }
00199 }
00200 
00201 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00202  * @brief   Capture Process function.
00203  * @retval  None
00204  ************************************************************************************************************/
00205 void Capture_Process(sPulseCaptureStructure* cap, u16 capture_value, bool isCapBeforeUpdate)
00206 {
00207   if (cap->ChannelPolarity == TM_CHP_NONINVERTED)
00208   {
00209     /* Reset OverflowCounter and store capture value when rising edge occurred                              */
00210     if (isCapBeforeUpdate)
00211     {
00212       cap->OverflowCounter = 1;
00213     }
00214     else
00215     {
00216       cap->OverflowCounter = 0;
00217     }
00218 
00219     cap->StartValue = capture_value;
00220 
00221     /* Change channel polarity to capture when falling edge occur                                           */
00222     cap->ChannelPolarity = TM_CHP_INVERTED;
00223   }
00224   else
00225   {
00226     /* Compute pulse width in PCLK unit when falling edge occurred                                          */
00227     if (isCapBeforeUpdate)
00228       cap->OverflowCounter--;
00229 
00230     /* Pulse width clock cycles = (overflow counter * (CounterReload + 1)) - rising capture + falling capture */
00231     cap->CapturePulse = (cap->OverflowCounter << 16) - cap->StartValue + capture_value;
00232 
00233     if (cap->DataValid)
00234       cap->DataOverwrite = TRUE;
00235     else
00236       cap->DataValid = TRUE;
00237 
00238     /* Change channel polarity to capture when rising edge occur                                            */
00239     cap->ChannelPolarity = TM_CHP_NONINVERTED;
00240   }
00241 }
00242 
00243 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00244   * @brief   Configures TM to output PWM waveform.
00245   * @retval  None
00246   * @details Configuration as frequency 1 Hz and duty 2500 uS (10/4000).
00247   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00248 void PWM_OUT_Configuration(void)
00249 {
00250   { /* Enable peripheral clock                                                                              */
00251     CKCU_PeripClockConfig_TypeDef CKCUClock = {{ 0 }};
00252     CKCUClock.Bit.AFIO = 1;
00253     CKCUClock.Bit.HTCFG_PWM_IPN = 1;
00254     CKCU_PeripClockConfig(CKCUClock, ENABLE);
00255   }
00256 
00257   /* Configure AFIO mode as TM function                                                                     */
00258   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_PWM_GPIO_ID, HTCFG_PWM_AFIO_PIN, HTCFG_PWM_AFIO_FUN);
00259 
00260   { /* Time base configuration                                                                              */
00261 
00262     /* !!! NOTICE !!!
00263        Notice that the local variable (structure) did not have an initial value.
00264        Please confirm that there are no missing members in the parameter settings below in this function.
00265     */
00266     TM_TimeBaseInitTypeDef TimeBaseInit;
00267 
00268     TimeBaseInit.Prescaler = (SystemCoreClock / HTCFG_PWM_TM_PCLK) - 1;
00269     TimeBaseInit.CounterReload = HTCFG_PWM_TM_PCLK - 1;                  // PWM frequency = 1 Hz
00270     TimeBaseInit.RepetitionCounter = 0;
00271     TimeBaseInit.CounterMode = TM_CNT_MODE_UP;
00272     TimeBaseInit.PSCReloadTime = TM_PSC_RLD_IMMEDIATE;
00273     TM_TimeBaseInit(HTCFG_PWM_PORT, &TimeBaseInit);
00274 
00275     /* Clear Update Event Interrupt flag since the "TM_TimeBaseInit()" writes the UEV1G bit                 */
00276     #if 0
00277     TM_ClearFlag(HTCFG_PWM_PORT, TM_FLAG_UEV);
00278     #endif
00279   }
00280 
00281   { /* Channel n output configuration                                                                       */
00282 
00283     /* !!! NOTICE !!!
00284        Notice that the local variable (structure) did not have an initial value.
00285        Please confirm that there are no missing members in the parameter settings below in this function.
00286     */
00287     TM_OutputInitTypeDef OutInit;
00288 
00289     OutInit.Channel = HTCFG_PWM_CH;
00290     OutInit.OutputMode = TM_OM_PWM2;
00291     OutInit.Control = TM_CHCTL_ENABLE;
00292     OutInit.ControlN = TM_CHCTL_DISABLE;
00293     OutInit.Polarity = TM_CHP_NONINVERTED;
00294     OutInit.PolarityN = TM_CHP_NONINVERTED;
00295     OutInit.IdleState = MCTM_OIS_LOW;
00296     OutInit.IdleStateN = MCTM_OIS_HIGH;
00297     OutInit.Compare =  HTCFG_PWM_TM_PCLK - (HTCFG_PWM_TM_PCLK * 0.0025);      // PWM CCR = PWM clock * 2500 us
00298     OutInit.AsymmetricCompare = 0;
00299     TM_OutputInit(HTCFG_PWM_PORT, &OutInit);
00300   }
00301 
00302   TM_Cmd(HTCFG_PWM_PORT, ENABLE);
00303 }

00312 void assert_error(u8* filename, u32 uline)

00316      Debug message can be added here.
00317      Example: printf("Parameter Error: file %s on line %d\r\n", filename, uline);
00318   */
00319 
00320   while (1)
00321   {
00322   }
00323 }
